trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Eureka
There were no other sightings in Eureka on or around October 20th 2009
divs: Sighting Details I went to retrieve the newspaper at 6:30 a.m. and the sky was quite clear; The sun had just started to lighten the sky. As I was walking back into the house, I looked north, and right near the little dipper(?) there was this bright immobile "star". As I was watching it, the "star" slowly dimmed out to nothing like it was on a dimmer switch. It hadn't moved at all before it faded out and after it went out I stood there for a few moments to see if the light may have been part of an aircraft's running lights. But the light never came back on and there was no other movement in the sky.
Summary: it was like a bright star or bright planet
